description: Cardinality of the (ordered) list L_n defined inductively by: L_1 = {2}; L_(n+1) = L_n - {p}, where p is the first member of L_n, from left to right, such that prime(n+1) can be appended to the end or beginning of p so that the neighboring digits are equal, if p exists; append prime(n+1) to the end of L_n, otherwise.
